bilingual.source: They are newly married and very happy together.
bilingual.target: 他们新近地结婚了，非常幸福。

bilingual.source: The newly discovered species has fascinated scientists.
bilingual.target: 新近地发现的物种让科学家们着迷。

bilingual.source: She moved into her newly renovated apartment last week.
bilingual.target: 她上周搬进了新近地装修好的公寓。

bilingual.source: The newly appointed manager is already making significant changes.
bilingual.target: 新近地任命的经理已经在进行重大变革。

bilingual.source: The company newly launched a product that has gained a lot of attention.
bilingual.target: 公司新近地推出了一款引起广泛关注的产品。

bilingual.source: This is our newly designed build in projector.
bilingual.target: 这是我们新近设计的内装式放映机.

bilingual.source: Adiponectin is one of the newly founded adipocytokines.
bilingual.target: 脂联素是新近发现的一种脂肪因子。

bilingual.source: The paintings that(which) were newly sold at high prices are all forgeries.
bilingual.target: 那些新近以高价售出的画都是赝品。

bilingual.source: The paintings that(which) were newly sold at high prices are all forgeries .
bilingual.target: 那些新近以高价售出的画都是赝品。

bilingual.source: This newly - made film has been remarked upon by many critics.
bilingual.target: 这部新近拍摄的影片已经受到了许多评论家的评论.

yingyinNormal.en: Howard and Bernadette, the five of us stand before you as your friends and newly ordained ministers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 霍华德，伯纳黛特，今天我们作为你们的朋友兼牧师站在你们的面前。

yingyinNormal.en: This is a new development. This is in Lewisville. It's right near the newly completed state highway 121.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一项新的发展，这是在刘易斯维尔市，这正好在新建成的国家高速公路附近。

yingyinNormal.en: Newly discovered fields in the U.S. led to a boom in the 1950s, driven by growing industrial and consumer needs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 近期在美国发现了几处天然气，使二十世纪五十年代的美国很是繁荣，这被用于逐渐发展的工业和居民生活。

yingyinNormal.en: These cars are made in America, out of American-made parts by newly hired American workers and have been specially designed to be sold in American markets.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些车是在美国制造的，没有美国制造的部分，雇用新的员工，特别设计专门在美国市场上出售。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: You are to write an email to James Cook, a <highlight>newly</highlight>-arrived Australian professor, recommending some tourist attractions in your city.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你要给新来的澳大利亚教授詹姆斯·库克写一封电子邮件，推荐你所在城市的一些旅游景点。

examination_example.sentence: Write a notice of about 100 words, providing the <highlight>newly</highlight>-enrolled international students with relevant information about the library.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 写一份100字左右的通知，向新入学的留学生提供图书馆的相关信息。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>newly</highlight> revised Danish Fashion Ethical Charter clearly states: "We are aware of and take responsibility for the impact the fashion industry has on body ideals."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最新修订的《丹麦时尚道德章程》明确规定：“我们意识到时尚产业对身材标准的影响，并为此负责。”

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Newly</highlight> published research shows how erroneous such overviews are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最新发表的研究表明这种概述是多么错误。

examination_example.sentence: In last week's lecture, we discussed the characteristics of the <highlight>newly</highlight> born offspring of several mammals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在上周的讲座中，我们讨论了几种哺乳动物新生后代的特征。

examination_example.sentence: The road was clearly built to provide services for the <highlight>newly</highlight> discovered stone pit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这条路显然是为了给新发现的石坑提供服务而修建的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It’s possible that there are living things in the <highlight>newly</highlight> discovered lake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新发现的湖中可能有生物。

examination_example.sentence: In 1956，the <highlight>newly</highlight> married couple first moved into the house.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1956年，这对新婚夫妇第一次搬进了这所房子。

examination_example.sentence: First he imitated the voices of <highlight>newly</highlight> hatched crows.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，他模仿刚孵出的乌鸦的声音。
